Line1.7FA05: A soulstone must always be guarded. It consumes your days, your dreams. You become a prisoner just as much as the demon contained in the stone.
Line3.7FA05: And, despite your efforts, the evil eventually finds a way to break free.
Line5.7FA05: Even so, I know of no better way to contain a demon. I wish I did, though.
VoiceDir3.7FA05: Quiet, in his own thoughts--musing about his own experience with the soulstone
